comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I could really use a ride today, but I've got at meeting at the CC at 1 pm. Hope I can join after the holiday when things might be a little cooler.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: As fate would have it I unknowingly dodged an invitation to the same 1 p.m. meeting that Greg is attended. That is until I was informed this morning of the meeting and my mandatory attendance at said meeting. With the mercury in the upper 80s prior to 10:45 I'm inclined to spend my lunch hour at the gym lifting weights. I'm going to get HUGE.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: The notion of a HUGE Burton should alarm us all...
